name: Enhanced Security for Schools
detail_description: As part of thesis, this project utilizes a bayesian stackelberg game theoratic approach with predictive analytics to finding the most optimal patrolling routes for increasing school security.
tools: Python, Scikit-Learn, SciPy, SimPy, Util, Matplotlib, Game theory

name: Drowsiness Detection System
detail_description: This projects aims to develop AI-powered alertness system for drivers using eye and face movement tracking.
tools: Python, OpenCV, TensorFlow, Keras, Matplotlib, Jupyter Notebook

name: Predicting IPO Performance
description: Identify right IPO to invest into.
detail_description: Built a machine learning model to predict IPO wins or losses on the listing day, achieving 82.5% accuracy.
tools: Python, Numpy, Pandas, Keras, Seaborn, bayesian optimization, Visual Studio

name: Gait Pattern Recognition
detail_description: Engineered state-of-the-art adaptive gait rehabilitation technique by integrating Proximal Policy Optimization with Algae Algorithm, optimizing gait metrics with SHAP analysis for impacting physical recovery.
tools: Python, Reinforcement Learning, PPO, CNN, Algae Algorithm

name: Danger Solar Flare Prediction
detail_description: Forecasted high-intensity solar flare impacts on Earth's atmosphere using time series models (ARIMA, VAR) and advanced EDA on the SWAN-SF dataset.
tools: R Programming, Time Series Analysis, ARIMA, VAR, Statistical Modeling

name: Music Genre Recommendation
description: Get curated genre playlist at ease.
detail_description: Built a music genre recommendation system so accurate, it could DJ your life—used K-means clustering and CatBoost to high 81% validation accuracy.
tools: Python, Numpy, Pandas, Classification, K-means Clustering, CatBoost, XGBoost

name: E-Consumers Segmentation
detail_description: Decoded e-commerce insights with customer segmentation using K-means and RFM analysis—the secret to happy customers and even happier sales teams!
tools: R, Business Intelligence, Visualization, Clustering, RFM Analysis

name: Web Development
detail_description: Designed and developed static responsive website utilizing core web development tools.
